definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: This optimal scheme can be used in other parallel flexible cable systems.
sentences.chinese: 这一方案也可用于其他并联悬索结构的张力配置。

sentences.english: A novel 3-DOF reducible translational parallel mechanism is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型三自由度移动可约并联机构。

sentences.english: Assembling capacitor bank now is used widely in power system.
sentences.chinese: 集合式并联电容器已广泛用于电力系统。

sentences.english: We can get more current from cells connected in parallel.
sentences.chinese: 电池并联时向我们提供的电流更大。

sentences.english: For current measurements, the customers use thermoelements connected in parallel with precision shunts .
sentences.chinese: 对于电流测量来说，客户使用热电偶并联精密分压器。

sentences.english: The whole sieve is composed of muli-reductor units parallel.
sentences.chinese: 整台筛机可由数个减速器单元并联而成。

sentences.english: Adopted with double taps. fixed with two vacuum meters used independently or parallelly .
sentences.chinese: 本机采用双抽头，可单独或并联使用装有两个真空表。

sentences.english: The burn-out accident occurred several times in operation of dry type hollow shunt reactor.
sentences.chinese: 干式空心并联电抗器在运行中曾发生多起烧损事故。

sentences.english: Then, a multi-objective optimization model for 3-TPT parallel mechanism structure was presented.
sentences.chinese: 多目标优化模型的建立对其他并联机构具有借鉴意义。

sentences.english: First, according to three kinds of hybrid input five bar mechanism, this paper decided on their solution space.
sentences.chinese: 混合输入五杆机构是最简单的平面并联机器人。

sentences.english: The novel features of the invention is a varistor that is connected in parallel with the capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 本发明的新颖特点在于有一并联在电容上的变阻器。

sentences.english: This dissertation focuses on the research of parallel operation control system about modular inverter.
sentences.chinese: 本文致力于模块化逆变电源并联控制系统的研究。

sentences.english: Two submerged plastics pumps pump up in parallel.
sentences.chinese: 两个塑料潜水泵并联泵水。

sentences.english: Under the situation of parallel operation, current-sharing strategy is used to accomplish load-sharing.
sentences.chinese: 在并联运转时，采用均流策略，以达成共同分担负载。

sentences.english: Design and development of a PC based NC system for Parallel Kinematic Machine(PKM) was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了并联机床加工中心数控系统的设计。

sentences.english: The method for selection of the value of parallel resistance is also described in the pape…
sentences.chinese: 文章还给出了并联电阻值的选择方法。

definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
